file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-40-07-04 - LAVATORY SOAP DISPENSER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LAVATORY SOAP DISPENSER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the soap dispenser. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY LAVATORY SOAP DISPENSER- REMOV- ALL 25-40-07-000-801-A AL LAVATORY SOAP DISPENSER - INSTAL- ALL 25-40-07-400-801-A LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-40-07 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-07-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LAVATORY SOAP DISPENSER- REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the lavatory soap dispenser. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Open the sink cabinet door. I. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-003-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT PRE-MOD SB 145-25-0290 (1) Lavatory Soap Dispenser Removal. Refer to Figure 401. (a) Remove the soap container (7) and adapter (6). (b) Remove the nut (5) and tooth lock washer (4). (c) Lift the soap dispenser assembly (1) and remove the washer (2) and rubber washer (3). SUBTASK 020-004-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT POST MOD SB 145-25-0290 (2) Lavatory Soap Dispenser Removal. Refer to Figure 402. (a) Remove the soap dispenser (1) from the base (3). (b) If it is necessary to remove the base (3) from the sink cabinet, do as follows: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-07 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL 1 Remove the nut (7), nut (6), and washer (5). 2 Remove the bolt (2), base (3), and rubber washer (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-07 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT PRE-MOD SB 145-25-0290 Lavatory Soap Dispenser - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 271 1. SOAP DISPENSER B SINK CABINET DOOR 6. ADAPTER 2. WASHER DET. A SINK CABINET (REF.) 3. RUBBER WASHER 7. SOAP CONTAINER 4. TOOTH LOCK WASHER 5. NUT DET. B EM145AMM252793A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-07 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT POST MOD SB 145-25-0290 Lavatory Soap Dispenser - Removal/Installation Figure 402 A ZONE 271 B 1. SOAP DISPENSER SINK CABINET DOOR DET. A 2. BOLT 3. BASE SINK CABINET (REF.) 4. RUBBER WASHER 5. WASHER DET. B 6. NUT 7. NUT EM145AMM252792A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-07 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-07-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. LAVATORY SOAP DISPENSER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the lavatory soap dispenser. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory H. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-003-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT PRE MOD SB 145-25-0290 (1) Lavatory Soap Dispenser Installation. Refer to (Figure 401). (a) Put the washer (2) and rubber washer (3) on the soap dispenser assembly (1). Refer to (Figure 401), DET. B. (b) Put the soap dispenser assembly (1) in position. (c) Put the tooth lock washer (4) in position and screw the nut (5) down. (d) Screw the adapter (6) to the soap dispenser assembly (1) and then screw the soap container (7) down to the adapter (6). SUBTASK 420-004-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT POST MOD SB 145-25-0290 (2) Lavatory Soap Dispenser Installation. Refer to (Figure 402). (a) If you removed the base (3) from the sink cabinet, do as follows: 1 Put the rubber washer (4), base (3), and bolt (2) in position. 2 Put the washer (5) in position and, screw the nut (6) and nut (7) down. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-40-07 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Install the soap dispenser (1) on the base (3). I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Close the sink cabinet door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-40-07 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
